data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Kumanovo to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kumanovo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kumanovo, North Macedonia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 599 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kumanovo do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Kumanovo a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Kumanovo. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kumanovo, North Macedonia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kumanovo, North Macedonia has a population of 105,500.

We estimate Kumanovo has 176 people who might know Jesus, 65,205 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 40,119 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 599 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 176 believers in Kumanovo that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
